channel.title: Application Types :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Types of application you can build Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Description: Explains at a high level the different types of applications developers can build as Okta defines them. Also, why you’d want to build them in the first place. Web applications (OIDC, SAML, SWA) API Service Apps Lifecycle apps (SCIM and Workflow Connectors)) Expands “Create your own integration in Okta” to be more of a thought-leading piece about making any type of app public or private and the pros and cons of that decision.
